Name: Phantom Halls
About the game: Phantom Halls is a squad-based side-scrolling comedy-horror game. A group of teens from the Occult Studies Club set out on an assignment, but quickly find themselves attempting to survive a night in a haunted mansion... Prepare to face the undead terrors that stalk the phantom halls! Squad up to escape alive using whatever you can find, but remember - you canâ€™t kill what you can't see, so be sure to bring a flashlight! Features - Fast-paced, action-packed, squad-based gameplay - Unique 3D papercraft visual style - Play through the campaign in single-player or drop-in/out local co-op - Various characters, quests, weapons and items to unlock - Gather items and craft upgrades, from cosmetic improvements to party-wide perks - Includes officially licensed Evil Dead 2 content!
